title: Secret Diaries: Confessions of a Submissive
description: M/F BDSM Romance – Unlock the passions of a secret love affair. The year is 1961, the location is the private law office of the handsome but very exacting Mr. Stevenson. Innocent secretary Olivia, returning to the work force, finds herself both confused and aroused by Mr. Stevenson’s many rules and punishments for failure to follow those rules to the letter. Olivia is slowly but inexorably drawn into the erotic world of sensual submission at the hands of her boss, who will stop at nothing to claim her for his own.
author: Claire Thompson
